snippet: The spy scandal involving the Patriots lives on. Eric Mangini says he wishes he hadn't pointed the finger. And Ravens Coach John Harbaugh probably wishes he didn't mention the subject.
abstract: The spy scandal involving the Patriots lives on. Eric Mangini says he wishes he hadn't pointed the finger. And Ravens Coach John Harbaugh probably wishes he didn't mention the subject.

headline.main: Harbaugh and Mangini on Spying and Telling
